thread.title: Dollar Wavers After Monday’s Sharp Drop Off

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Wavers After Monday’s Sharp Drop Off
text:
The dollar edged lower Tuesday, as stocks rebounded following Monday’s big drop.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently down 0.2% at 83.69. The gauge was as high as 84.08 earlier in the session.
Investors seeking shelter from a sharp drop in equity prices have helped...
